title: Roosters
description: Jeff and Sam are cousins spending a glorious summer at their Nan's farm, looking forward to fishin' and shootin'. They stumble into gruesome hints of a secret club, where a game of unspeakable acts maintains the pecking order.  Can they rescue Sam's big sister from her new romance with the heir of the club's money and power--himself haunted by one outrageous ghost?
author: Brian P.  Vadimsky
